subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Villarreal and Major League soccer reached a deal to send the 18-year-old New York Red Bulls and U.S. national team striker Jozy Altidore to Spain for an undisclosed amount.
snippet: Villarreal and Major League soccer reached a deal to send the 18-year-old New York Red Bulls and U.S. national team striker Jozy Altidore to Spain for an undisclosed amount.
